table.name: berli_map
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `berli_map` ( `mapid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `state` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `postalCode` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `street` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `lat` float(10,6) NOT NULL, `lng` float(10,6) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mapid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_berli_map` FOREIGN KEY (`mapid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_crmentity` (`crmid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
